participant_1.background: i am a stay at home dad. i've a son who is in junior high school. i spent a decade working in the human services field. horror movies are my favorites.

participant_2.background: i am studying to be a computer programmer. my mother is very traditional while i prefer to be more free spirited. my favorite music genre is death metal. my family and i are from india.
